name: Megaport
desc: A vast starport where the stars can touch the dirt. Regimented lander gantries and armoured fuel tanks are laced together by access-roads and short-haul cargo trams feeding a sprawl of warehouse districts and logistics terminals, all making the colony vastly more accessible.

name: Modularized Port
desc: Split megaport into multiple sections, strongly enhanced its functionalities

name: Automated Port Complex
desc: A prototype city design from [REDACTED] station, the complex has more advanced facilities at the cost of huge construction credits and high upkeeps.

name: Organ Harvesting
desc: Harvesting crew's organ for black marketing.

name: Drug Production
desc: Using organic resources to produce recreational drugs.

name: Condition Modifier
desc: Add several upgrade options

name: Upgrade to sparse ore

name: Upgrade to moderate ore

name: Upgrade to abundant ore
desc: Upgrade moderate ore deposit to abundant ore deposit.

name: Upgrade to rich ore

name: Upgrade to ultrarich ore

desc: Remove ore ore deposit
